channel.title: Natural Language Processing on Tobias Larysch: Personal Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Natural Language Processing on Tobias Larysch: Personal Portfolio

item.title: Building a Genre Classifier using fastai
item.description: In this project I build a neural net to classify songs into one of three genres based on their lyrics. The lyrics are obtained via the lyricsgenius package and the model is built with the powerful fastai library.
